related_post.text: what's the purpose of the raise keyword in python. Even after reading through this stackoverflow post: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13957829/howtouseraisekeywordinpython/13957849#13957849 I still don't understand the purpose of raising an error. Is it printing out the error or what?
